mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT menu.ID, menu.NAME, menu.ICON FROM menu menu, role_user ru, role_menu rm, role role WHERE menu.IS_VALID = 1 AND menu.PARENT_ID = 1 AND menu.ID = rm.MENU_ID AND ru.ROLE_NAME = rm.ROLE_NAME AND role.IS_VALID = 1 AND ru.USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID, NAME, ICON, PARENT_ID, IS_LEAF FROM menu WHERE IS_VALID = 1 AND PARENT_ID IS NOT NULL -- AND scale <> 0 AND IS_SHOW = 1 ORDER BY PARENT_ID, SORT ASC

SELECT menu.ID, menu.NAME, menu.LABEL, menu.PARENT_ID, menu.SORT, menu.PERMISSION, menu.ICON, menu.EXPANDED, menu.IS_LEAF, menu.WINDOW_ID, open_window.NAME AS WINDOW_NAME, menu.IS_VALID, menu.IS_SHOW, menu.CREATE_USER AS CREATE_USERNAME, create_user.NAME AS CREATE_NAME, menu.CREATE_TIME, menu.REMARK FROM menu LEFT JOIN window open_window ON menu.WINDOW_ID = open_window.ID LEFT JOIN v_sys_user create_user ON menu.CREATE_USER = create_user.USERNAME

SELECT menu.ID, menu.NAME, menu.LABEL, menu.PARENT_ID, menu.SORT, menu.PERMISSION, menu.ICON, menu.EXPANDED, menu.IS_LEAF, menu.WINDOW_ID AS WINDOW_ID, open_window.NAME AS WINDOW_NAME, menu.IS_VALID, menu.IS_SHOW, menu.CREATE_USER AS CREATE_USERNAME, create_user.NAME AS CREATE_NAME, menu.CREATE_TIME, menu.REMARK FROM menu LEFT JOIN window open_window ON menu.WINDOW_ID = open_window.ID LEFT JOIN user create_user ON menu.CREATE_USER = create_user.USERNAME WHERE menu.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
